item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Thanks Mikkel,</p><p>That's what I had assumed was happening but just wanted to make sure I hadn't missed an email.</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Thanks Mikkel,

That’s what I had assumed was happening but just wanted to make sure I hadn’t missed an email.

Matt

item.title: By: Mikkel Heisterberg
item.dc:creator: Mikkel Heisterberg
item.description: <p>You should hear either way, that is for both sessions having been accepted and rejected, from IBM but I don't think any official e-mails has gone out yet. There are rumours about unofficial e-mails though... I think the official e-mails will be out late this week or early next week.</p>
item.content:encoded: You should hear either way, that is for both sessions having been accepted and rejected, from IBM but I don’t think any official e-mails has gone out yet. There are rumours about unofficial e-mails though… I think the official e-mails will be out late this week or early next week.
